EmailTemplate.description: Notification on completion of task which they had assigned to a user
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: Completion of assigned Task
EmailTemplate.subject: Task assigned to {!AssignedUserName} has been completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, The task assigned to {!AssignedUserName} towards BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has been completed. Please review the task. The BX009 specific to this task can be accessed via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}.
Thanks.
